fullplot: After witnessing the public humiliation & abuse of a female friend, a young man vows to avenge her by going after the hoodlums responsible. he is guided by a burnt out, cynical cop, who shows him the ropes as well as the realities of vigilante life.

title: Raakh

tomatoes.consensus: A moderately funny comedy that will reward patient viewers.
